name: outbound-rules
description: Protect against XSS by restricting access to outbound resources if a page defines a rule list

scripts.build: npm run compile && rollup build/chrome-background.js > background.js
scripts.release: ver=$(jq -r .version < manifest.json) && npm run build && zip -r outbound-rules-$ver.xpi manifest.json logo.png background.js LICENSE AUTHORS README.md
